text: Ezɨ gumazir kaba bar moghɨra Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn uari akuvagha, Atrivim Joasɨn apengan ikiasa akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavim gami. Ezɨ Jehoiada kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ikiavɨra Itir God akar dɨkɨrɨzim kamaghɨn a gamigha ghaze, dughiabar zurara atriviba Devitɨn ikɨzimɨn otivam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Ia izɨ Joasɨn ganigh. An Atrivim Ahasian otarim, an atrivimɨn otivam.
